author: Just Jared
title: Selena Gomez Teases New Song on Instagram - Listen Now!
text:
Selena Gomez is finally giving us new music and it sounds amazing! 
The 24-year-old songstress took to her Instagram story on Friday (February 3) to share a snippet of a brand new song. 
‚ÄúI had a dream we were back, just 17, summer nights‚Ä¶never growing up,‚Äù Selena sings on the track. 
Selena didn‚Äôt give any details about the new song but she did meet ex boyfriend Justin Bieber in 2009, when she was 17!
We don‚Äôt think Selena will be spilling any more deets though because she even drew an X over her mouth to show that her lips are sealed!
Listen to the track below‚Ä¶
